column5: Has anyone been to lake Tommyhow about 110 miles out of Atikokan Ontario? I booked a Moose hunt for late Sept.2004 and will only be hunting in early am and late pm for moose rest of the time I will be fishing. Any input would help. Thanks Abe
Would like some info on this lake. Thx
Ontario MNRF has a site called Fish ON - Line that might be helpful to you.

We fished Tommyhow in early July of 2013. The thing I remember most about the trip was the blackflies being worse by far than any other trip we did, although we normally do August trips. I think it was a fairly shallow lake. We caught fish at either end by the falls and creek as well as some other places around the lake but I don't remember anything of any size nor any particular hot spot. There was a mayfly hatch for a few days so that didn't help the fishing. There was one portage lake but we didn't do it and I don't remember why - maybe the water was too low making it too difficult?
